questions.quote: Aah, hey.  If this works out, forget about it. Vacations together, movies together, dinner together. It..it's almost as good as if I didn't get married.
Please! Please!! I take it all back, everything! I take it all back, every word! I love you! I love *you*! I can't live without you, I,ll, I'll do anything!
Ah. It's a lovely little bureau and breakfast you're running. Well, I'm off to the bank.
I remember you donated to some volcano thing on our first date.
Well, you're the big look expert. I wanna see how smart you are.
I don't know what'cha had to tell her that for. You put me in a very difficult position, Marine Biologist! I'm very uncomfortable with this whole thing.
Attention Steinbrenner and front-office morons! Your triumphs mean nothing. You all stink. You can sit on it, and rotate! This is George Costanza. I fear no reprisal. Extension five-one-seven-oh.
Oh, the dogs did that but it wasn't their fault, somebody stuffed some strange meat in the pocket.
You're through, Soup Nazi. Pack it up. No more soup for you. Next!
Look at you, you're still thinking about it. I'll never feel comfortable.
